00036 #include "CellPropertyCollection.hpp"
00037 
00038 CellPropertyCollection::CellPropertyCollection()
00039     : mpCellPropertyRegistry(NULL)
00040 {
00041 }
00042 
00043 CellPropertyRegistry* CellPropertyCollection::GetCellPropertyRegistry()
00044 {
00045     if (!mpCellPropertyRegistry)
00046     {
00047         /*
00048          * If no cell population has taken ownership of the registry and assigned
00049          * this class a pointer, then store a pointer to the singleton.
00050          */
00051         mpCellPropertyRegistry = CellPropertyRegistry::Instance();
00052     }
00053     return mpCellPropertyRegistry;
00054 }
00055 
00056 void CellPropertyCollection::SetCellPropertyRegistry(CellPropertyRegistry* pRegistry)
00057 {
00058     mpCellPropertyRegistry = pRegistry;
00059 }
00060 
00061 void CellPropertyCollection::AddProperty(const boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellProperty>& rProp)
00062 {
00063     if (HasProperty(rProp))
00064     {
00065         EXCEPTION("That property object is already in the collection.");
00066     }
00067     mProperties.insert(rProp);
00068 }
00069 
00070 bool CellPropertyCollection::HasProperty(const boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellProperty>& rProp) const
00071 {
00072     return (mProperties.find(rProp) != mProperties.end());
00073 }
00074 
00075 void CellPropertyCollection::RemoveProperty(const boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellProperty>& rProp)
00076 {
00077     IteratorType it = mProperties.find(rProp);
00078     if (it == mProperties.end())
00079     {
00080         EXCEPTION("Collection does not contain the given property.");
00081     }
00082     else
00083     {
00084         mProperties.erase(it);
00085     }
00086 }
00087 
00088 unsigned CellPropertyCollection::GetSize() const
00089 {
00090     return mProperties.size();
00091 }
00092 
00093 CellPropertyCollection::Iterator CellPropertyCollection::Begin()
00094 {
00095     return mProperties.begin();
00096 }
00097 
00098 CellPropertyCollection::Iterator CellPropertyCollection::End()
00099 {
00100     return mProperties.end();
00101 }
00102 
00103 boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellProperty> CellPropertyCollection::GetProperty() const
00104 {
00105     if (GetSize() == 1)
00106     {
00107         return *mProperties.begin();
00108     }
00109     else
00110     {
00111         EXCEPTION("Can only call GetProperty on a collection of size 1.");
00112     }
00113 }
